data.title: Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick Kids (All about their 3 kids)
data.meta_description: Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick have three kids: son James Wilkie and twin daughters Tabitha Hodge and Marion Loretta Elwell.
data.text:
Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick Kids: Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick are married Hollywood stars with three kids. They have an oldest son named James Wilkie, who is 21, and twin daughters, Tabitha Hodge and Marion Loretta Elwell, who are 14. The family is very close.

Sarah Jessica Parker, known for her role as Carrie Bradshaw in the TV show “Sex and the City,” started acting when she was very young. She has been in both TV shows and movies. Matthew Broderick became famous for his roles in movies like “Ferris Bueller’s Day Off” and “The Producers.”

Carrie Bradshaw may be the “last single girl” on the hit HBO series Sex and the City, but Sarah Jessica Parker has been married to her husband, Matthew Broderick, since 1997. Since their wedding, Parker and Broderick have become parents to son James Wilkie, who is 21 years old, and twin daughters Tabitha Hodge and Marion Loretta Elwell, who are 13 years old.

In December 2022, Parker and Broderick took their kids to the premiere of the Broadway musical Some Like It Hot. Photographers snapped the family’s photo before they entered New York City’s Shubert Theatre.

In this article, we will discuss everything about Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick Kids.

Who is Sarah Jessica Parker?

Sarah Jessica Parker was born in 1965 in Nelsonville, Ohio. She started acting at a young age and first performed in local theater productions. Her big opportunity came when she was just 11 years old and landed a role in the Broadway show “Annie.” Later, she acted in movies like “Footloose” and “Girls Just Want to Have Fun.” However, her most famous role is as Carrie Bradshaw in the TV series “Sex and the City,” which aired from 1998 to 2004.

Sarah won several awards for playing Carrie, including an Emmy. Besides acting, she is also a producer and a fashion icon. She has created her own perfume line and fashion label. Sarah Jessica Parker’s rise from a small-town girl to a Hollywood star and businesswoman is an inspiring story for many aspiring actors and entrepreneurs.

Who is Matthew Broderick?

Matthew Broderick was born on March 21, 1962, in New York City, USA. He comes from a creative family; his father was an actor and his mother was a playwright. Broderick started acting young and first appeared on Broadway at just 17 in the play “Torch Song Trilogy.” He became very famous for his role as Ferris Bueller in the movie “Ferris Bueller’s Day Off” (1986), where he played a high school student on an exciting adventure.

Broderick also starred in other movies like “WarGames” (1983) and “Biloxi Blues” (1988), showing his skills in both comedy and drama. He has had a successful stage career too, winning Tony Awards for his roles in “Brighton Beach Memoirs” and “How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying.” Matthew Broderick’s talent and charm have made him a well-loved figure in Hollywood.

Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick 3 Kids

Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick are a famous couple who have three children. Their oldest child is a son named James Wilkie, who is 21 years old. They also have twin daughters named Tabitha Hodge and Marion Loretta Elwell, who are 14 years old.

Here’s everything you want to know about Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick Kids.

James Wilkie Broderick, 21

James Wilkie Broderick, the first child of Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick, was born on October 28, 2002, at Lenox Hill Hospital in Manhattan. He weighed 6 lbs, 8 oz and was named after Broderick’s father, James Broderick.

James has kept a low public profile but has joined his parents at several red carpet events, including the premieres of “Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows” and the series “And Just Like That...” in 2021. He also commented on enjoying the “And Just Like That…” reboot in 2023.

Sarah Jessica Parker celebrates James’ birthdays with heartfelt posts on Instagram, sharing her emotions and the significant impact James has on their family. The family remains close, as seen in their trip photos shared on Instagram in February 2024.

Tabitha Hodge and Marion Loretta Elwell Broderick, 13

On June 22, 2009, Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick welcomed twin daughters, Tabitha Hodge and Marion Loretta Elwell, through surrogacy in Martins Ferry, Ohio. Sarah Jessica Parker shared her happiness with Access Hollywood, noting how excited her son James and her husband were about the new family members.

In 2018, Parker spoke about her daughters’ unique personalities. Tabitha likes to play alone, while Loretta prefers more frequent interaction. They even go to different schools, a choice that shows their independence.

Both girls have shown a keen interest in fashion, which was evident when they were excited to see their mom on the cover of Vogue in 2021. They also love “Hocus Pocus,” Sarah Jessica Parker’s 1993 film. When Parker filmed “Hocus Pocus 2,” the twins were thrilled to meet co-stars Bette Midler and Kathy Najimy.

Conclusion

In conclusion, Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick have managed to combine Hollywood success with down-to-earth parenting. Their three kids, James, Tabitha, and Marion, known as Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick kids, have grown up with both public attention and privacy. The couple has skillfully handled media exposure to protect their family’s private life. The couple’s successful careers in acting have not overshadowed their dedication to family life, evident in their supportive and hands-on parenting style. Through their public appearances and media interactions, they have shown a balance between work and family commitments, setting an example for many in Hollywood.

Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick Kids (All about their 3 kids) – FAQs

Who are Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick kids?

They have three kids: James Wilkie Broderick, Tabitha Hodge Broderick, and Marion Loretta Elwell Broderick.

How old is Sarah Jessica Parker?

Sarah Jessica Parker is 59 years old. She was born on March 25, 1965.

What were Sarah Jessica Parker’s early life and career like?

Sarah Jessica Parker started acting at a young age and became famous for her role in “Sex and the City” as Carrie Bradshaw.

What about Matthew Broderick’s early life and career?

Matthew Broderick is known for his roles in movies like “Ferris Bueller’s Day Off” and “The Producers,” and he started acting when he was a teenager.

How did Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick meet and get married?

They met through friends, fell in love, and got married in 1997 after dating for a few years.

What is their parenting style like, and how do they balance work and family life?

They are known for being private about their family life but are seen as dedicated parents. They try to balance their busy work schedules with spending time with their children, often seen together in public as a family.
